message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that's mutually beneficial. I am proposing to sell this exceptional product to you for $7,200. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your positive response.
